Example.Title: Auto Row & Column
Example.Description: Automatically generate rows and columns based on the number of elements
Example.Code: <Grid xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:panels="clr-namespace:Rubik.Theme.Panels;assembly=Rubik.Theme"> <panels:UniformPanel Height="150" Space="20,10" Padding="20,0"> <Button Content="1"/> <Button Content="2"/> <Button Content="3"/> <Button Content="4"/> <Button Content="5"/> </panels:UniformPanel> </Grid>

Example.Title: Fixed Rows
Example.Description: Arrange child elements according to the number of rows
Example.Code: <Grid xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:panels="clr-namespace:Rubik.Theme.Panels;assembly=Rubik.Theme"> <panels:UniformPanel Height="150" Space="20,10" Padding="20,0" Rows="1"> <Button Content="1"/> <Button Content="2"/> <Button Content="3"/> <Button Content="4"/> <Button Content="5"/> </panels:UniformPanel> </Grid>

Example.Title: Fixed Columns with FirstColumn
Example.Description: Arrange child elements according to the number of columns
Example.Code: <Grid xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:panels="clr-namespace:Rubik.Theme.Panels;assembly=Rubik.Theme"> <panels:UniformPanel Height="150" Space="20,10" Padding="20,0" Columns="3" FirstColumn="1"> <Button Content="1"/> <Button Content="2"/> <Button Content="3"/> <Button Content="4"/> <Button Content="5"/> </panels:UniformPanel> </Grid>
